name: Haunted Dreams (Unfinished)
description:
Literally spent 2 days on remaking discord in Game maker. 

You can call your friends before you start, or just go directly to sleep.

We ran out of time, and my head is pounding right now, so I won't be able to continue, so I am uploading this now, before going to sleep.

Thanks for playing!

I'll add pics later!

~CETeam
